flow.description: The IMF DataMapper API can be used to retrieve time series as used in the DataMapper. Endpoints are available to get lists of indicators, countries, regions and analytical groups used in these time series.
flow.name: imf-datamapper

properties.SQL:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS IMF_DATAMAPPER_INDICATORS (
    indicator VARCHAR(50),
    country_code VARCHAR(10), 
    year NUMBER(4,0),
    value NUMBER(15,6),
    ingestion_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

IMF DataMapper Parameters.description: The IMF DataMapper API can be used to retrieve time series as used in the DataMapper. Endpoints are available to get lists of indicators, countries, regions and analytical groups used in these time series.
IMF DataMapper Parameters.name: IMF DataMapper Parameters
